course_description: Essential mathematical tools for graduate physics, with an emphasis on fluency and intuition over formal rigor. Topics include complex analysis, linear algebra, basic differential equations, Fourier analysis, and variational calculus.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - N301
sections: Class Nbr: 1819, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: D. Weissman, Status: Open
